column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: UPDATE: It is reported that three suspects were involved in the fatal shooting of Zhang Dan (*initial name)
column4: a 25-year-old Chinese female casino worker  resident in Village 3
column6: Sihanoukville.------Reports------ say she and her boyfriend named Xiao Li Zhi had left their casino workplace
column7: heading to a shopping mall. Two or three men in a waiting car attempted to grab the couple and bundle them into the car
column8: but when they resisted shots were fired
column9: causing the female victim to be killed instantly.------The suspects then escaped in the car.------His boyfriend is currently being questioned and the criminal police are actively conducting research to arrest and punish the suspects.------A Chinese woman was found murdered in the street im=n Sangkat 3
column10: Sihanoukville at 11:30 pm on July 23.------Police are investigating. Some reports are now saying she had been shot.------Updates to follow.------Source: Huy Bunleng More photos of the scene (graphic): :------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/59998
